pages.text: $(l)$(o)Generators $()use other resources to create energy known as Lazuli Flux for your machines
The $(l)$(o)Coal Generator $()can use, not only coal, but anything a furnace can to generate energy.
The $(l)$(o)Solar Generator $()will generate energy as long as the sunlight can reach it.
The $(l)$(o)Heat Generator $()will consume lava inside it to generate energy. Pairs up well with the pump.
